member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.UniqueFilterMode
member.summary: Defines whether to allow creating multiple filter conditions for a field in a group or all groups in query builder.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.UniqueFilterMode.None
member.summary: Defines the unique filter mode as 'None' to disable the unique filter where end-user can create multiple filter conditions for a field option.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.UniqueFilterMode.Group
member.summary: Defines the unique filter mode as 'Group' to allow the unique filters within a group. Once filter condition is created for a field then user can create filter condition for the same field in next group only.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.UniqueFilterMode.All
member.summary: Defines the unique filter mode as 'All' to allow unique filters within entire query builder. Once filter condition is created for a field then user canâ€™t create filter condition for the same field in any group.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType
member.summary: Specifies default operator.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.Equal
member.summary: Represents the equality operator.
member.remarks: It compares the given value to the records in a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.NotEqual
member.summary: Represents the inequality operator.
member.remarks: It compares the given value to the records in a database and returns the matched records where the values are not equal.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.StartsWith
member.summary: Represents the 'starts with' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given field or value starts with a specified substring in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.EndsWith
member.summary: Represents the 'ends with' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given field or value ends with a specified substring in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.Contains
member.summary: Represents the 'contains' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given field or value contains a specified substring in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.NotStartsWith
member.summary: Represents the 'not starts with' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given field or value does not start with a specified substring in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.NotEndsWith
member.summary: Represents the 'not ends with' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given field or value does not end with a specified substring in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.NotContains
member.summary: Represents the 'not contains' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given field or value does not contain a specified substring in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.GreaterThan
member.summary: Represents the greater than operator.
member.remarks: It compares the given value to the records in a database and returns the matched records where the values on the left-hand side are greater than the right-hand side value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.LessThan
member.summary: Represents the less than operator.
member.remarks: It compares the given value to the records in a database and returns the matched records where the values on the left-hand side are less than the right-hand side value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.GreaterThanOrEqual
member.summary: Represents the greater than or equal to operator.
member.remarks: It compares the given value to the records in a database and returns the matched records where the values on the left-hand side are greater than or equal to the right-hand side value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.LessThanOrEqual
member.summary: Represents the less than or equal to operator.
member.remarks: It compares the given value to the records in a database and returns the matched records where the values on the left-hand side are less than or equal to the right-hand side value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.In
member.summary: Represents the 'in' operator.
member.remarks: It compares values from the specified collection to the records in a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.NotIn
member.summary: Represents the 'not in' operator.
member.remarks: It compares values from the specified collection to the records in a database and returns the records that do not match.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.Between
member.summary: Represents the between operator.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.NotBetween
member.summary: Represents the 'not between' operator.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.IsNull
member.summary: Represents the 'is null' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given value is null in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.IsNotNull
member.summary: Represents the 'is not null' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given value is not null in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.IsEmpty
member.summary: Represents the 'is empty' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given field or value is empty in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.IsNotEmpty
member.summary: Represents the 'is not empty' operator.
member.remarks: It checks if the given field or value is not empty in the records of a database and returns the matched records.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.None
member.summary: Represents the scenario where no operator has been selected.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperatorType.Auto
member.summary: Represents the auto operator which is starts with for string and equal for number, boolean, and date.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1
member.summary: Used to configure the query builder events.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.OnValueChange
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised before the condition (And/Or), field, operator, value is changed.
member.value: An event callback function.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.Changed
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after changing the condition(AND/OR), field, value, operator is changed.
member.value: An event callback function.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.Created
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after the component is created.
member.value: An event callback function.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.DataBound
member.summary: Triggers when data source is populated in the Querybuilder.
member.value: An event callback function.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.RuleChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after changing the condition(AND/OR), field, value, operator is changed.
member.value: An event callback function.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.OnActionFailure
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after the data fetch request from the remote server fails.
member.value: An event callback function.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.RuleDragStarting
member.summary: Gets or sets the event callback that is invoked before dragging a rule or group in a .
member.remarks: This event will be triggered when the property is set to true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.RuleDropping
member.summary: Gets or sets the event callback that occurs before dropping an item onto another item.
member.remarks: This event will be triggered when the property is set to true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderEvents`1.RuleDropped
member.summary: Gets or sets the event that is raised after dropping a rule or group onto another rule or group.
member.remarks: This event will be triggered when the property is set to true.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField
member.summary: A class that represents the field model of SfQueryBuilder component to specify the customized option to the field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize filtering, popup width and height, width of the field dropdown list by specifying value to corresponding property. Remaining necessary properties were added to dropdown list by default.
member.example:
In the below code example, field dropdown list can be customized using tag directive.
<SfQueryBuilder TValue="Employee"> <QueryBuilderField AllowFiltering="true"></QueryBuilderField> <QueryBuilderColumns> <QueryBuilderColumn Field="CustomerID" Label="CustomerID" Type=Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ColumnType.String Values="values"> </QueryBuilderColumn> <QueryBuilderColumn Field="EmployeeID" Label="EmployeeID" Type=Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ColumnType.Number></QueryBuilderColumn> </QueryBuilderColumns> </SfQueryBuilder>

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.AllowFiltering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the filtering option in the field dropdown list.
member.value: true, if the filtering option is enabled in the field dropdown list. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FilterType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the filter type.
member.value: One of the enumeration. The default value is
member.remarks: If the FilterType is StartsWith, the filtering will be performed using starts with operator. If the FilterType is EndsWith, the filtering will be performed using ends with operator. If the FilterType is Contains, the filtering will be performed using contains operator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FilterBarPlaceholder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates place holder for filtering option in field dropdown list.
member.value: The filter bar place holder accepts a string value. The default value is "Select Field".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.Placeholder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates place holder for field dropdown list.
member.value: The place holder accepts a string value. The default value is "Select Field".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.PopupHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates height of field dropdown list's popup.
member.value: The popup height accepts a string value. The default value is "200px".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.PopupWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates width of field dropdown list's popup.
member.value: The popup width accepts a string value. The default value is "100%".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.ShowClearButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the clear button in the field dropdown list.
member.value: true, if the clear button is enabled in the field dropdown list. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates width of field dropdown list.
member.value: The width accepts a string value. The default value is "100%".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FieldDropDownOpening
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while opening field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using BeforeOpenEventArgs.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FieldDropDownClosed
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while closing field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FieldDropDownOpened
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after opening field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using PopupEventArgs.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderField.FieldDropDownFiltering
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while filtering on field dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the filtering using FilteringEventArgs.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator
member.summary: A class that represents the operator model of "SfQueryBuilder" component to specify the customized option to the operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize filtering, popup width and height, width of the operator dropdown list by specifying value to corresponding property. Remaining necessary properties were added to dropdown list by default.
member.example:
In the below code example, field dropdown list can be customized using tag directive.
<SfQueryBuilder TValue="Employee"> <QueryBuilderOperator AllowFiltering="true"></QueryBuilderField> <QueryBuilderColumns> <QueryBuilderColumn Field="CustomerID" Label="CustomerID" Type=Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ColumnType.String Values="values"> </QueryBuilderColumn> <QueryBuilderColumn Field="EmployeeID" Label="EmployeeID" Type=Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ColumnType.Number></QueryBuilderColumn> </QueryBuilderColumns> </SfQueryBuilder>

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.AllowFiltering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the filtering option in the operator dropdown list.
member.value: true, if the filtering option is enabled in the operator dropdown list. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.FilterType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the filter type.
member.value: One of the enumeration. The default value is
member.remarks: If the FilterType is StartsWith, the filtering will be performed using starts with operator. If the FilterType is EndsWith, the filtering will be performed using ends with operator. If the FilterType is Contains, the filtering will be performed using contains operator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.FilterBarPlaceholder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates place holder for filtering option in operator dropdown list.
member.value: The filter bar place holder accepts a string value. The default value is "Select Operator".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.Placeholder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates place holder for operator dropdown list.
member.value: The place holder accepts a string value. The default value is "Select Operator".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.PopupHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates height of operator dropdown list's popup.
member.value: The popup height accepts a string value. The default value is "200px".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.PopupWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates width of operator dropdown list's popup.
member.value: The popup width accepts a string value. The default value is "100%".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.ShowClearButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the clear button in the operator dropdown list.
member.value: true, if the clear button is enabled in the field dropdown list. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates width of operator dropdown list.
member.value: The width accepts a string value. The default value is "100%".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.OperatorDropDownOpening
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while opening operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using BeforeOpenEventArgs.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.OperatorDropDownClosed
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while closing operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.OperatorDropDownOpened
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised after opening operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the dropdown list item rendering using PopupEventArgs.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.QueryBuilderOperator.OperatorDropDownFiltering
member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised while filtering on operator dropdown list.
member.remarks: You can customize the filtering using FilteringEventArgs.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1
member.summary: Query Builder is a graphical user interface that used for filtering large amounts of data by creating or editing conditions.
Query Builder is a graphical user interface that used for filtering large amounts of data by creating or editing conditions.
Query Builder is a graphical user interface that used for filtering large amounts of data by creating or editing conditions.
Query Builder is a graphical user interface that used for filtering large amounts of data by creating or editing conditions.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.UpdateChildProperties(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: To update the child properties

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetColumn(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the column of given field.
member.param: Field be passed to get the column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the id attribute for query builder element.
member.value: Accepts the string value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.ChildContent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates content for query builder element including HTML and its customizations.
member.value: Accepts a RenderFragment that defines the content of the UI element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.AllowValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enables or disables the validation.
member.value: true, if the validation can be enabled. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.AllowDragAndDrop
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drag and drop option for rules/ groups is enabled in the to move the rules/ groups.
member.value: true If the drag handle will be rendered in front of the rule/ group element to perform, drag and drop; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.remarks: When this property is set to true, the drag handle will be rendered in front of the rule/ group element to perform, drag and drop. When set to false, the drag handle element is not rendered.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.ColumnTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the template for all columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.CssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets CSS class string to customize the appearance of querybuilder.
member.value: Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to customize the appearance of querybuilder. The default value is String.Empty.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DataSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the data source of querybuilder.
member.value: Accepts the list items either through local or remote service and binds it to the component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the displayMode as Horizontal or Vertical.
member.value: One of the DisplayMode enumeration. The default value is DisplayMode.Horizontal
member.remarks: If the DisplayMode is Horizontal, the columns will be aligned horizontally. If the DisplayMode is Vertical, the columns will be aligned vertically.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.EnableNotCondition
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the not group condition in query builder.
member.value: true, if the not group condition can be enabled. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.
member.value: true, if the persistence can be enabled. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.EnableRtl
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the right to left direction option in query builder.
member.value: true, if the right to left direction can be enabled. Otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the height of the query builder.
member.value: Accepts the string value. The default value is auto.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.ImmediateModeDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the time delay to trigger the rule change event.
member.value: Accepts double value and the rule change event is triggered after that specified time delay.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.MatchCase
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the grid filtering with exact match.
member.value: true, if the match case is enabled it filters with case sensitive. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.MaxGroupCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum group count or restricts the group count.
member.value: Accepts an integer value. The default value is 5.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.Readonly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the user interactions in the component.
member.value: true, if the query builder component cannot be edited. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.SortDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the sort direction of the field names.
member.value: One of the SortDirection enumeration. The default value is SortDirection.Default
member.remarks: If the SortDirection is Default, the field names will be ordered in default order. If the SortDirection is Ascending, the field names will be ordered in ascending order. If the SortDirection is Descending, the field names will be ordered in descending order.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.SummaryView
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable filtered query as summary view.
member.value: true, if the filtered query as summary view can be enabled. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the width of the query builder.
member.value: Accepts the string value. The default value is auto.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.Separator
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the separator for complex data binding.
member.value: Accepts the string value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.UniqueFilterMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to allow creating multiple filter conditions for a field in a group or all groups. Be default, end-user can create multiple filter conditions for a field. The unique filter option for the fields in query builder where once filter condition created for a field then you can prevent creating further conditions in a group or for all groups.
member.value: One of the enumeration. The default value is .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DefaultSelectedField
member.summary: Gets or sets the default field to be selected when inserting a new rule or group in the SfQueryBuilder.
member.value: The field name string to be selected. The default value is an empty string.
member.remarks: The field dropdown will render with the specified value. The operator and value controls will be rendered once the field gets selected in the field dropdown list. If set to an empty string, the dropdown list renders with a placeholder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DefaultSelectedOperator
member.summary: Gets or sets the default operator to be selected when inserting a new rule / group or changing fields in the SfQueryBuilder.
member.value: The `QueryBuilderOperatorType` enum value to be selected. The default value is â€œEqualâ€ operator for number, date, and boolean and â€˜StartsWith` operator for string.
member.remarks: The operator dropdown will render with the specified value. The value controls will be rendered once the operator gets selected in the operator dropdown list. If set to an empty string, the dropdown list renders with a placeholder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.EnableIndividualConditions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether rules and groups are connected using separate connectors in the .
member.value: true if the separate connector functionality is enabled; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.remarks: When this property is set to true, each rule or group will have its own connector, allowing them to be connected separately with different connectors. When set to false, connectors will be shared between rules and groups, possibly connecting them with the same connector.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.AddGroup(Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleModel,System.String)
member.summary: Adds single or multiple groups, which contains the collection of rules.
member.param: Groups be passed to add the group.
GroupID be be added in the group.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.AddRule(Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleModel,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds the specified rule into the group which is specified using GroupID parameter.
member.remarks: The rule can be added as group of rules if the IsGroupRule> property is true other wise it is added at the bottom of the group.
member.param: The rule be passed to add the rules.
The groupID to be passed to specify the group to add rules.
To add the rule under the respected group tree.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DeleteGroup(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the group or groups based on the group ID.
member.param: GroupId be passed to delete the group.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.DeleteRule(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the rule or rules based on the rule ID.
member.param: RuleId be passed to delete the rule.

member.summary: Sets the rules from the parameterized named SQL query to the .

member.summary: Clones the rule based on the rule ID to the specific group in the .

member.summary: Clones the group based on the group ID to the specific group in the .

member.summary: Locks the rule based on the rule ID in the .

member.summary: Locks the group based on the group ID in the .

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.SfQueryBuilder`1.GetRule(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the RuleModel of a rule or group based on the given ID in a .
member.remarks: It returns the RuleModel of a rule when the ID of the rule is passed to this method. It returns the RuleModel of a group when the ID of the group is passed to this method.
member.returns: The RuleModel corresponding to the provided ID.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDragStartingEventArgs
member.summary: Provides the event data for the event of the .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDragStartingEventArgs.DragRuleID
member.summary: Gets the ID of the rule being dragged within the source .
member.value: A string representing the ID of the dragged rule. Returns null if a group is being dragged.
member.remarks: The DragRuleID property returns the ID of a rule only when a rule is being dragged. It returns null when a group is being dragged.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDragStartingEventArgs.DragGroupID
member.summary: Gets the ID of the group being dragged within the source .
member.value: A string representing the ID of the dragged group. Returns null if a rule is being dragged.
member.remarks: The DragGroupID property returns the ID of a group only when a group is being dragged. It returns null when a rule is being dragged.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDragStartingEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drag start event should be canceled.
member.value: true if the drag event should be canceled; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDroppingEventArgs
member.summary: Provides the event data for the event of the .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDroppingEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dropping event should be canceled.
member.value: true if the dropping event should be canceled; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDroppingEventArgs.DropRuleID
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the rule ID on which the dropping is performed in if the dropping is performed on a rule.
member.value: A string value that represents the rule ID of the item on which dropping is performed. Returns null if the dropping is performed on a group.
member.remarks: The DropRuleID property returns the ID of a rule only when the dropping is performed on a rule. Use the GetRule method to retrieve the rule based on the provided DropRuleID. It returns null when the dropping is performed on a group.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDroppingEventArgs.DropGroupID
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the group ID on which the dropping is performed in if the dropping is performed on a group.
member.value: A string value that represents the group ID of the item on which dropping is performed.
member.remarks: The DropGroupID property returns the ID of a group only when the dropping is performed on a group. Use the GetGroup method to retrieve the group based on the provided DropGroupID. It returns null when the dropping is performed on a rule.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDroppedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides the event data for the event of the .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDroppedEventArgs.DropRuleID
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the rule ID on which the dropping is performed in if the dropping is performed on a rule.
member.value: A string value that represents the rule ID of the item on which dropping is performed. Returns null if the dropping is performed on a group.
member.remarks: The DropRuleID property returns the ID of a rule only when the dropping is performed on a rule. Use the GetRule method to retrieve the rule based on the provided DropRuleID. It returns null when the dropping is performed on a group.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.RuleDroppedEventArgs.DropGroupID
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the group ID on which the dropping is performed in if the dropping is performed on a group.
member.value: A string value that represents the group ID of the item on which dropping is performed.
member.remarks: The DropGroupID property returns the ID of a group only when the dropping is performed on a group. Use the GetGroup method to retrieve the group based on the provided DropGroupID. It returns null when the dropping is performed on a rule.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.NamedParameterSql
member.summary: This interface defines the properties necessary to execute a parameterized SQL query. It encapsulates the parameters and their values, enabling secure and efficient database operations.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.NamedParameterSql.Sql
member.summary: Defines the SQL WHERE clause with bind variable placeholders for each value.
member.remarks:
Using bind variable placeholders helps in separating SQL logic from data, enhancing security by preventing SQL injection attacks.
string sql = â€œSELECT * FROM Users WHERE Username = ? AND Password = ?â€;

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.NamedParameterSql.Params
member.summary: Specifies the bind variable names from the `SQL` string to the associated values.

member.summary: Interface for a class Operator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.OperatorsModel.Text
member.summary: Specifies text or label of the operator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.OperatorsModel.Value
member.summary: Specifies value of the operator.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.HeaderTemplateModel
member.summary: Interface for a class Header Template.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.HeaderTemplateModel.ID
member.summary: Specifies Group ID.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.HeaderTemplateModel.Condition
member.summary: Specifies Group Condition.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.HeaderTemplateModel.Not
member.summary: Specifies Group NOT condition.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.HeaderTemplateModel.IsLocked
member.summary: Specifies whether the group is locked or not.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ParameterSql
member.summary: This interface defines the properties necessary to execute a parameter SQL query. It encapsulates the parameters and their values, enabling secure and efficient database operations.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ParameterSql.Sql
member.summary: Defines the SQL WHERE clause with bind variable placeholders for each value.
member.remarks:
Using â€œ?â€ placeholders help in separating SQL logic from data, enhancing security by preventing SQL injection attacks.
string sql = â€œSELECT * FROM Users WHERE Username = ? AND Password = ?â€;

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.QueryBuilder.ParameterSql.Params
member.summary: Defines the parameter values in the same order as their respective placeholders appear in the SQL string.
member.remarks: This approach ensures that the parameters are correctly mapped to their corresponding placeholders in the SQL string, enabling accurate execution of parameterized queries. Note: This comment is specific to using question mark (?) placeholders for parameters in the SQL string.
